last_episode_to_air.name: Southern Forest Heritage Museum
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Ghost Brothers investigate the Southern Forest Heritage Museum where the Long Leaf Sawmill, known to locals as the Mill of Death, houses the restless spirits of those who met a gruesome end in its grip.

name: Ghost Brothers
overview: Ghost Brothers, is a trio of friends exploring the paranormal with a dash of comedy.

episodes.name: Magnolia Plantation
episodes.overview: The Magnolia Plantation in Derry, Louisiana, which dates back to the early 1800's, entices the Ghost Brothers to investigate claims of deceased slaves still practicing voodoo in the afterlife.

episodes.name: The Allen House
episodes.overview: The guys travel to Monticello, Ark., to investigate the Allen House, which has claims of doppelgangers and apparitions connected to a love triangle and a jilted woman's suicide that took place in 1949.

episodes.name: Prospect Place
episodes.overview: The guys visit a historic mansion in Trinway, Ohio, hoping to discover whether an evil entity and other unsettled spirits that allegedly date back to the Civil War still reside on the property.

episodes.name: The Delta Queen
episodes.overview: The Delta Queen, a historic riverboat, was relocated to Houma, LA for extensive renovations, setting off paranormal activity. The Ghost Brothers' mission is to find out what spirit is behind the frightening phenomena.

episodes.name: Magnolia Hotel
episodes.overview: The Magnolia Hotel in Seguin, Texas, is investigated by the guys, who are on a mission to find out if murders and suicides that have occurred there are linked to an alleged continued presence of threatening paranormal activity.

episodes.name: The Fitzpatrick Hotel
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers head to Washington, Georgia to try to solve the mysterious hauntings of The Fitzpatrick Hotel, which was built on a gravesite. Some believe that reports of multiple female spirits residing at the hotel are tied to a tragic death.

episodes.name: Thornhaven Manor & Magnolia Plantation
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers travel to New Castle, Indiana to investigate paranormal claims at the historic Thornhaven Manor. They search for answers as to what is behind phenomena here. And then they investigate the Magnolia Plantation in Derry, Louisiana.

episodes.name: Longleaf Sawmill
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers head to Long Leaf, Louisiana to investigate a desolate sawmill that locals call the "Mill of Death". Claims of apparitions and shadow people are attributed to numerous tragic accidents.

episodes.name: Winchester Mystery House
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers travel to San Jose, California to investigate the maze-like home of the heir to the Winchester Rifle fortune.

episodes.name: Old City Jail
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers travel to Charleston, South Carolina to investigate claims of apparitions and physical attacks, believed to be connected to the first female serial killer and other former dangerous inmates.

episodes.name: Rose Hall
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers travel to Montego Bay, Jamaica to investigate a historic plantation that is rumored to be haunted by the infamous White Witch of Rose Hall. According to legend, she murdered her three husbands, slaves and practiced voodoo.

episodes.name: Cocke County Memorial Building
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers investigate the Cocke County Memorial Building in Newport, Tennessee. There have been claims of apparitions and threatening activity in the building connected to a mysterious and tragic plane crash that happened in1964.

episodes.name: Poasttown Elementary School
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers travel to Middletown, Ohio to investigate an abandoned elementary school. It's believed that chilling paranormal activity could be connected to a tragic train crash.

episodes.name: House of Wills
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers travel to Cleveland, Ohio to investigate a former funeral home. The building was constructed to trap energy and could be the reason behind reports of a dark presence and apparitions being seen roaming the property.

episodes.name: Southern Forest Heritage Museum
episodes.overview: The Ghost Brothers investigate the Southern Forest Heritage Museum where the Long Leaf Sawmill, known to locals as the Mill of Death, houses the restless spirits of those who met a gruesome end in its grip.
